page.title: 09POLEGATE SPORTS ASSOCIATION
page.content: POLEGATE SPORTS & LEISURE ASSOCIATION WAS FORMED ABOUT 12 YEARS AGO TO INCREASE THE FACILITIES AVAILABLE TO LOCAL PEOPLE. ITS MAIN AIM IS TO PROVIDE AND RUN A SPORTS & LEISURE CENTRE AT THE BRIGHTLING ROAD GROUND WITH INDOOR/OUTDOOR FACILITIES. THE ASSOC. IS CURRENTLY INVOLVED IN RAISING FUNDS AND PAST EFFORTS INCLUDE XMAS DRAW,BAZAARS,JUMBLE SALES,CAR BOOT SALES,SPONSORED SWIMS,ETC. THERE ARE ABOUT 12 PEOPLE ORGANISING ACTIVITIES AND MANY LOCAL CLUBS ARE AFFILIATED.AT PRESENT THERE ARE NOT REALLY ANY SPORTS FACILITIES IN THE AREA. THE ASSOC. AIMS TO PROVIDE FOR THE LOCAL PEOPLE,ADVENTURE PLAYGROUNDS TENNIS,ARCHERY,PUTTING,BAR & CLUB FACILITIES ETC. THE COST OF THE PROJECT IS @Â£400,000 OF WHICH THE ASSOC.
